definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
(prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

sentences.english: So far eight people have died from flooding in Michigan and Indiana.
sentences.chinese: 至今密歇根州和印第安納州已有八人因洪水喪生。

sentences.english: Rival Hillary Clinton claimed victory in a close race in Indiana.
sentences.chinese: 他的對手克林頓參議員則在印第安納州小勝。

sentences.english: Indiana observes it on a county-by-county basis.
sentences.chinese: 印第安納州是以縣爲基礎考慮是否遵守的。
歡迎來到印第安納州聖克勞斯。

sentences.english: A'fter grad'u. a'tion Mar'y return'ed home to her small town in In'di. an'a.
sentences.chinese: 畢業後瑪麗返回了她的家鄉，印第安納州的一個小鎮。

sentences.english: An Indiana state trooper stopped a car for a traffic violation.
sentences.chinese: 一名印第安納州州警因爲違反交通攔下一輛轎車。

sentences.english: Indiana’s shore is still lined with steel plants and refineries.
sentences.chinese: 印第安納州的湖濱仍然矗立着大量的鋼鐵廠和精煉廠。
